segments.text: Do you have a swimming pool in this hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We don't have a swimming pool , sir , but we do have swim stations in the gym .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I never heard of a swim station . Is that like a train or bus station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's just a deep bathtub with a current of water that you swim against .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Holy cow ! I never heard of such a thing . How much do they cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a guest , sir , you pay nothing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This sounds better every second . Now , when can I use the stations ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you want to swim , you can visit the gym any day between 7 a . m . and 10 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , boy ! This is going to be great . I'm going to the gym right now !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sure you'll enjoy your workout , sir . Everyone seems to like the swim stations .
segments.speaker: S2
